value.title: Do we need more Power BI Premium Capacity?
value.excerpt: Capacity planning for Power BI Premium is not an exact science. How much capacity do you need? As with most things, it depends! Adam walks through some things to consider when thinking about your planning.  Premium Gen2 capacity load evaluation https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-concepts

value.title: Dynamic labels in Power BI using DAX
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick uses a little DAX, and the SelectedValue function, to get you some dynamic labels in your Power BI reports.  For more information about SelectedValue, check out Marco Russo's blog on the function - https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/using-the-selectedvalue-function-in-dax/  LET'S CONNECT!

value.title: How the Power BI Data Region is selected
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how the Power BI data region is selected. This is the what you see when you go to About Power BI and see "Your data is stored in". You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft

value.title: Is a parameter filtered in Power BI Paginated Reports???
value.excerpt: How do you know if a parameter was filtered in your Power BI Paginated Reports? Was a slicer used in the Power BI report that is using the Paginated visual? Adam shows you a way you can find out!  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.title: Link from a Power BI Paginated report to a Power BI report
